identity.mission: Create a top 1% collaborative freight platform that blends trust, safety, and modern Brazilian aesthetics.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix logistics precision with community warmth.
Emotion First: Every screen must convey 'Safety' and 'Speed'.
Content is King: Data (ETA, Price, Trust Score) is the hero.
Zoom In: Focus on the human element (driver faces, package photos).
Negative Space: Use white space to reduce cognitive load.

headings.usage: Main headers, section titles, marketing copy. DO NOT use Inter.

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, data tables, inputs.

primary.name: Jungle Deep
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, brand headers.

grid_system.marketing: Bento Grid (Mode A) - Asymmetric, visual tension.
grid_system.dashboard: Control Room Grid (Mode B) - Dense, data-correlated.
grid_system.mobile: Single column, bottom-sheet heavy for actions.

spacing.base: Generous. Use p-6, p-8, p-12. Avoid cramped p-4.
spacing.containers: Borders must have internal padding (p-6+) to prevent text collision.

component_rules.general: Use Shadcn components but heavily customized. Remove the 'Vercel default' look.
component_rules.cards: Flat background, subtle border (border-slate-200), soft shadow (shadow-sm). Hover: lift (-translate-y-1) + shadow-md.
component_rules.buttons: Pill-shaped or rounded-xl. Primary: Jungle Deep bg, White text. Secondary: White bg, Border, Jungle text.
component_rules.inputs: Tall (h-12), light gray bg (bg-slate-50) on focus white with primary ring.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for sticky headers and overlays. backdrop-blur-xl + bg-white/70 + border-white/20.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Subtle mesh gradients in backgrounds for marketing. NO text gradients.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on solid colors to reduce 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.motion: Framer Motion for page transitions. Micro-interactions on all buttons.

hero_marketing.alt: Smiling delivery driver with green bag
hero_marketing.usage: Hero section, main landing page visual.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install dependencies: `yarn add @phosphor-icons/react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge`.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Configure Tailwind: Add 'Outfit' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' fonts. Add custom colors (Jungle Deep, Lime Punch). Set default radius.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create Layouts: Build 'MarketingLayout' (Glass header, footer) and 'DashboardLayout' (Sidebar, Topbar).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Develop Components: Customize Button, Card, Input, Badge to match 'Levva' brand.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Build Pages: Landing -> Auth -> Dashboard -> Trip/Shipment Flows.
instructions_to_main_agent.critical: Do NOT use generic 'Inter' font. Do NOT make it look like a default Shadcn template. Use the images provided.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Create depth with z-index and shadows.
Dark colors: Use independently, NO dark gradients.
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-filter blur(12px) for overlays.
Transitions: specific properties only (transform, opacity), NEVER 'all'.
Alignment: No text-align: center on app container.
Icons: Use Phosphor Icons (Duotone for marketing, Regular for UI).
Testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
